description: This is a Java source file defining the RuntimeStatsPojo class, which is part of an IPC (Inter-Process Communication) implementation. The class provides methods for managing runtime statistics data, including JSON serialization and deserialization, and supports dynamic key-value storage with type annotations.

classes.name: RuntimeStatsPojo
classes.description: A data object representing runtime statistics for IPC communication, supporting JSON encoding/decoding.

methods.name: getServiceName
methods.description: Returns the name of the service associated with this runtime stats instance.

methods.name: setServiceName
methods.description: Sets the name of the service.

methods.name: getCollectionTime
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of when the statistics were collected.

methods.name: getKeyIterator
methods.description: Provides an iterator over the keys stored in the internal map.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of key-value pairs stored.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a String value for a given key.

methods.name: getDate
methods.description: Retrieves a Date value for a given key.

methods.name: getInt
methods.description: Retrieves an Integer value for a given key.

methods.name: getLong
methods.description: Retrieves a Long value for a given key.

methods.name: setString
methods.description: Stores a String value with an associated key.

methods.name: setDate
methods.description: Stores a Date value with an associated key.

methods.name: setInt
methods.description: Stores an Integer value with an associated key.

methods.name: setLong
methods.description: Stores a Long value with an associated key.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the object into a JSON representation.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the object from a JSON representation.
